news.title: European leaders outraged after Russian strikes kill 19 and damage EU's HQ
news.summary: The overnight attacks destroyed a block of flats and also caused damage to the EU's delegation offices.

news.title: Lives torn apart in Kyiv after Russia's heaviest bombardment for weeks
news.summary: In the deadliest strike, a missile ripped through the middle of a low-rise block of flats.

news.title: British Tour de France winner Chris Froome airlifted to hospital after 'serious' crash
news.summary: Four-time Tour de France winner Chris Froome suffers multiple injuries in a training crash in southern France.

news.title: Epping asylum seeker hotel order could spark more protests, court told
news.summary: Lawyers for The Bell Hotel owners are challenging the decision for a temporary injunction at court.

news.title: Met special constable found guilty of child rape
news.summary: James Bubb, who now identifies as a woman named Gwyn Samuels, abused a position of trust, police say.

news.title: US Fed Governor Lisa Cook sues Trump over his attempt to fire her
news.summary: The president has accused Cook of mortgage fraud, and cited constitutional power that he says allows him to fire her.

news.title: Price of weight loss drug Mounjaro to be discounted in UK pharmacies
news.summary: The rebate allays fears of a 170% price rise but patients are warned the cost of the drug will still jump.

news.title: 'The whole town is on a high': What Grimsby's dramatic win over Man Utd means to fans
news.summary: The morning after the night before, the Lincolnshire town reflects on its team's historic win.

news.title: Electric cars eligible for Â£3,750 discount announced
news.summary: The Puma Gen-E and e-Tourneo Courier are two Ford models drivers can purchase under the government scheme.

news.title: Reform council boss bans local newspaper's reporters
news.summary: The Nottingham Post describes the ban as "concerning" and "unprecedented".
